name: Rosy Edge
advancements: Increase shatter by **15%** and restore **10%** of HP after shattering the target's shield.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **16%**.
Upon switching to the weapon, gain an Ice Shield equal to **10%** of Max HP. Cooldown **20** seconds. The Ice Shield lasts up to **10** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.
Increase damage and shatter by **50%** while the shield is active.
Upon switching to the weapon, gain an Ice Shield equal to **20%** of Max HP and immmune to controls when shield is active. Cooldown: **20** seconds. The Ice Shield lasts up to **10** seconds.

abilities.name: Heavy Cleave
abilities.description: While on the ground, swing a greatsword to attack 4 times in a row.
breakdown: **156.3%** of ATK + **8**, **strongly suspend** the target, then launch them upon landing.

abilities.name: Aerial Strike
abilities.description: While airborne or after jumping once, tap normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
breakdown: **140.5%** of ATK + **7** and **knockdown**, launch the target upon landing.

abilities.name: Rising Slash
abilities.description: After the third normal attack, hold normal attack to trigger Rising Slash. Upon hit, **strongly suspend** the target and go airborne, dealing damage equal to **64.3%** of ATK + **3**.

abilities.name: Moonset Slash
abilities.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (or tap when a target is selected), or tap normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Moonset Slash. While falling, each hit deals damage equal to **12.5%** of ATK + **1**. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **140.5%** of ATK + **7** and launch targets. The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then tap normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **570%** of ATK + **30**.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: While standing still or moving, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Whirlwind, dealing damage equal to **132.8%** of ATK + **7** every **0.5** seconds to the target. Grant hitstun immunity while in use.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for **0.5** seconds.

abilities.name: Devastate
abilities.description: Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Devastate. Deal damage equal to **65.9%** of ATK + **3** each hit and **launch** targets.

abilities.name: Crescent Slash
abilities.description: Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Crescent Slash. Swing the blade to unleash sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to **49.6%** of ATK + **3**.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Swing the blade to launch sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to **141.7%** of ATK + **7** and increasing damage dealt by **5%** with each hit. While active, immune to control effects. Cooldown: **45** seconds.

abilities.name: Frost Barrier
abilities.description: When ***weapon charge is full*** or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the wielder**, and smash the ground to form a barrier, dealing damage equal to **503.2%** of ATK + **26** to nearby enemies, knocking enemies into the air. This reduces their speed by **50%** and stops them from dodge or jump. The barrier lasts **5** seconds and blocks projectiles.
